Description: Handle sliver of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Damaged since Petrie's drawing. Clay fine pink-buff. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Petrie Diary (EES Archive XVII 47) p. 185, 15. Name Mikythos. From same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, ABC 0389.18.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.0542)
